item.title: WATCH: Around 100 vehicles involved in massive pile-up in Michigan, police say
item.description: About 100 vehicles, including around 40 semi trucks, were involved in a massive chain-reaction crash just west of Grand Rapids, Michigan, according to...

item.title: WATCH: Moose joins skiers on the Park City slopes
item.description: Skiers stopped to admire a young moose galloping down the slopes at Utah's Park City Mountain Resort.

item.title: Valentino, fashion designer to stars, has died at age 93
item.description: Valentino Garavani died at his home in Rome, according to a post on his official Instagram page.

item.title: Aid workers, women say they face brunt of violence in Sudan amid deadly conflict

item.title: WATCH: Thousands gather for 'Hands off Greenland' protest in Denmark
item.description: A large crowd of demonstrators chanted "Greenland is not for sale" outside the U.S. embassy in Copenhagen over the weekend.
